# Option 2: Forward slashes (simpler)
setwd("D:/qq-trade-off-nutrition/data")

# 2. List all CSV files
files <- list.files(pattern = "\\.csv$", full.names = FALSE)

# 3. View the file names
print(files)

# 4. Optional: Save the list of files to a CSV
write.csv(data.frame(File_Name = files),
          "list_of_files.csv",
          row.names = FALSE)
